name: Arlene Klasky

roles_in_work.title: Rugrats in Paris: the movie = Rugrats II

biography: Arlene Phyllis Klasky (born May 26, 1949) is an American animator, graphic designer, producer and co-founder of Klasky Csupo with G치bor Csup칩.  In 1999, she was named one of the "Top 25 Women in Animation" by Animation Magazine. She is most known for her work with Nickelodeon in the 1990s and 2000s. She, along with her ex-husband G치bor Csup칩 and Paul Germain, co-created the animated series Rugrats as well as the 2021 revival series of the same name.
